abstract: A jury ruled that Vonage violated three Verizon patents, dealing a blow to a company already showing signs of stress.
snippet: A jury ruled that Vonage violated three Verizon patents, dealing a blow to a company already showing signs of stress.
lead_paragraph: A federal court yesterday ordered the Vonage Holdings Corporation, the Internet phone provider, to pay $58 million for infringing Verizon’s patents, dealing a blow to a company already showing signs of stress.

headline.main: Court Orders Vonage to Pay $58 Million in Patent Case
headline.print_headline: Court Orders Vonage to Pay $58 Million In Patent Case
